c1.name: Factor Confluence
c1.descriptionRaw: The Soulwind state of <color=#FFD780FF>Starfrost Swirl</color> can decrease the healing interval between instances caused by <color=#FFD780FF>Skyfeather Song</color>'s Eagleplume state. This decrease percentage is equal to the ATK SPD increase provided by Soulwind.
c1.description: The Soulwind state of Starfrost Swirl can decrease the healing interval between instances caused by Skyfeather Song's Eagleplume state. This decrease percentage is equal to the ATK SPD increase provided by Soulwind.

c2.name: Companion's Ingress
c2.descriptionRaw:
When <color=#FFD780FF>Starfrost Swirl</color>'s Flowfrost Arrow first hits an opponent, or its Rimestar Flare hits an opponent, 1 Detector stack from Passive Talent "Suppressive Barrage" will be generated.
You must have unlocked the Passive Talent "Suppressive Barrage" first.
c2.description:
When Starfrost Swirl's Flowfrost Arrow first hits an opponent, or its Rimestar Flare hits an opponent, 1 Detector stack from Passive Talent "Suppressive Barrage" will be generated.
You must have unlocked the Passive Talent "Suppressive Barrage" first.

c3.name: Reconnaissance Experience
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Skyfeather Song</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Skyfeather Song by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Sunfrost Encomium
c4.descriptionRaw: When Mika's own <color=#FFD780FF>Skyfeather Song</color>'s Eagleplume state heals party members, this will restore 3 Energy to Mika. This form of Energy restoration can occur 5 times during the Eagleplume state created by 1 use of Skyfeather Song.
c4.description: When Mika's own Skyfeather Song's Eagleplume state heals party members, this will restore 3 Energy to Mika. This form of Energy restoration can occur 5 times during the Eagleplume state created by 1 use of Skyfeather Song.

c5.name: Signal Arrow
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Starfrost Swirl</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of Starfrost Swirl by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Companion's Counsel
c6.descriptionRaw:
The maximum number of Detector stacks that <color=#FFD780FF>Starfrost Swirl</color>'s Soulwind can gain is increased by 1. You need to have unlocked the Passive Talent "Suppressive Barrage" first.
Additionally, active characters affected by Soulwind will deal 60% more Physical CRIT DMG.
c6.description:
The maximum number of Detector stacks that Starfrost Swirl's Soulwind can gain is increased by 1. You need to have unlocked the Passive Talent "Suppressive Barrage" first.
Additionally, active characters affected by Soulwind will deal 60% more Physical CRIT DMG.
